forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
